overview: Tchaikovsky's timeless masterpiece remains an indispensable classic for all ballet and music lovers worldwide.  On Christmas Eve, the mysterious Drosselmeyer gives his godchild Marie a nutcracker doll. At midnight, however, the Nutcracker comes to life and finds himself in the middle of a fight against the Mouse King. The Nutcracker is determined to protect Marie from the Mouse King.
title: Bolschoi Ballett: Der Nussknacker
